gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer

Class NameChoiceSeq

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer.NameChoiceSeq

  • public class NameChoiceSeq
extends Object
    Stores one occurrence of either a name, choice, or sequence in the content model. Each comes with an optional quantifier. If this is a name, then type == 0, name will be non-empty, and kids will be null. If it is a choice (type == 1) or seq (type == 2) then name will be empty and kids will have a valid Vector object.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the name for name types; empty string otherwise.

      • setType

        public void setType(int t)
             throws Exception
        Set the type. You can only change from a choice to seq or vice versa; not allowed to change from name to one of the others.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Get the type

      • setQ

        public void setQ(char newQ)
          throws Exception
        Set the quantifier string. You can only set this once, and it must be to one of the non-empty values "?", "*", or "+".
        Throws:
        Exception
